tooltip.last_approved_text: Be it on the frontline, flanking, or when manning ordnance, this versatile unit excels in most positions.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Be it on the frontline, flanking, or when manning ordnance, this versatile unit excels in most positions.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A shielded and fast-moving unit that absorbs missile fire to charge into vulnerable missile units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: A shielded and fast-moving unit that absorbs missile fire to charge into vulnerable missile units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit excels at charging enemy frontlines, slaying all in their path.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit excels at charging enemy frontlines, slaying all in their path.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These troops are best placed at the rear of an army, where they can cause damage from a position of relative safety.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These troops are best placed at the rear of an army, where they can cause damage from a position of relative safety.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Ordnance units excel at scything down enemies, particularly when on high ground and protected by infantry.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Ordnance units excel at scything down enemies, particularly when on high ground and protected by infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units are strong against flanking units such as cavalry, so are best used to protect vulnerable flanks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These units are strong against flanking units such as cavalry, so are best used to protect vulnerable flanks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fast, agile and devastating - flanking units can turn the tide of battle with a well-timed charge or by routing enemy missile units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Fast, agile and devastating - flanking units can turn the tide of battle with a well-timed charge or by routing enemy missile units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Frontline units are tough and able to withstand a beating; they will hold to the end, while others around flee. They are also adept at charging into enemy frontline units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Frontline units are tough and able to withstand a beating; they will hold to the end, while others around flee. They are also adept at charging into enemy frontline units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Skirmishers serve to distract and soften up enemy troops, and are almost impossible to run down as they harass their targets.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Skirmishers serve to distract and soften up enemy troops, and are almost impossible to run down as they harass their targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Best kept away from the fighting, this unit can bestow positive effects upon other units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Best kept away from the fighting, this unit can bestow positive effects upon other units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units harry the enemy, slowing them down through the use of advanced tactics and weaponry.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These units harry the enemy, slowing them down through the use of advanced tactics and weaponry.
placeholder

tooltip.last_approved_text: Heavy armour protects this unit from most damage, but armour-piercing weapons will still pose a threat to them.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Heavy armour protects this unit from most damage, but armour-piercing weapons will still pose a threat to them.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's weapons allow it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's weapons allow it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's missiles are heavily tipped to drill through the strongest armour, but will still be deflected by shields.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's missiles are heavily tipped to drill through the strongest armour, but will still be deflected by shields.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is highly skilled in parrying and dodging incoming melee attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is highly skilled in parrying and dodging incoming melee attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is trained to fight against mounted enemies.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is trained to fight against mounted enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is terrifying to its foes and reduces the morale of nearby enemies.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is terrifying to its foes and reduces the morale of nearby enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a superior, devastating charge attack compared to other flanking units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a superior, devastating charge attack compared to other flanking units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Incredible tenacity and a sharp weapon make this infantry unit strong whilst charging.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Incredible tenacity and a sharp weapon make this infantry unit strong whilst charging.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units cause untold damage to infrastructure by hurling heavy projectiles at enemy fortifications.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These units cause untold damage to infrastructure by hurling heavy projectiles at enemy fortifications.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is led by a person of great renown, who inspires the morale of those around them.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is led by a person of great renown, who inspires the morale of those around them.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An inexpensive unit of easily replaced individuals that can be sacrificed for the greater cause.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: An inexpensive unit of easily replaced individuals that can be sacrificed for the greater cause.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is immune to fatigue, and will carry on fighting when others have succumbed to exhaustion.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is immune to fatigue, and will carry on fighting when others have succumbed to exhaustion.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units have the advantage of being able to deploy behind enemy lines to strike at unexpecting targets.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These units have the advantage of being able to deploy behind enemy lines to strike at unexpecting targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a ranged weapon that can soften up enemies before engaging in hand-to-hand combat.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a ranged weapon that can soften up enemies before engaging in hand-to-hand combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An intimate knowledge of the land enables this unit to move freely across any terrain, whether that means fording rivers, navigating forests or traversing deserts.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: An intimate knowledge of the land enables this unit to move freely across any terrain, whether that means fording rivers, navigating forests or traversing deserts.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is highly skilled in melee and wears its enemies down through sustained hand-to-hand combat.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is highly skilled in melee and wears its enemies down through sustained hand-to-hand combat.

tooltip.last_approved_text: While the bow is this unit's primary weapon, it can also hold its own in melee.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: While the bow is this unit's primary weapon, it can also hold its own in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These troops carry shields to protect them from incoming missiles, but offer little defence against artillery.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These troops carry shields to protect them from incoming missiles, but offer little defence against artillery.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's training has reached a level where they can even deflect missiles without a shield!

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's training has reached a level where they can even deflect missiles without a shield!

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit will keep fighting even when others have already routed.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit will keep fighting even when others have already routed.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Melee cavalry use their speed to outmanoeuvre their enemies, striking at exposed flanks and vulnerable units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Melee cavalry use their speed to outmanoeuvre their enemies, striking at exposed flanks and vulnerable units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Mounted archers use their impressive speed and manoeuvrability to stay out of reach of the enemy and encircle unprotected units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Mounted archers use their impressive speed and manoeuvrability to stay out of reach of the enemy and encircle unprotected units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's oil arrows spatter flame over their targets upon impact, causing devastation over a larger area.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's oil arrows spatter flame over their targets upon impact, causing devastation over a larger area.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The weapons of this unit are coated in poison, inflicting lingering armour-ignoring damage on foes that are hit.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The weapons of this unit are coated in poison, inflicting lingering armour-ignoring damage on foes that are hit.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit excels at destroying lightly-armoured enemies, raining death upon them from a safe distance.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit excels at destroying lightly-armoured enemies, raining death upon them from a safe distance.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has powerful ranged attacks that can pierce armoured foes with ease.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has powerful ranged attacks that can pierce armoured foes with ease.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Individuals in this unit swing their weapons in a wide arc and are thus able to hit multiple foes at once.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Individuals in this unit swing their weapons in a wide arc and are thus able to hit multiple foes at once.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has an unshakable resolve and will fight to the bitter end.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has an unshakable resolve and will fight to the bitter end.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's heavy armour is no protection against armour-piercing weapons.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's heavy armour is no protection against armour-piercing weapons.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These soldiers are not disciplined enough to adopt advanced formations.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These soldiers are not disciplined enough to adopt advanced formations.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is very vulnerable to cavalry charges, especially to the flanks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is very vulnerable to cavalry charges, especially to the flanks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's speed and mass will work against it if charging the pointy end of enemy spears!

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's speed and mass will work against it if charging the pointy end of enemy spears!

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is only armoured with light cloth, making it vulnerable when engaged.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is only armoured with light cloth, making it vulnerable when engaged.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is unshielded and therefore has little defence against missile attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is unshielded and therefore has little defence against missile attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is likely to flee quickly when it suffers casualties or is involved in a losing battle.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is likely to flee quickly when it suffers casualties or is involved in a losing battle.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is slower than others, meaning it can be outmanoeuvred and attacked in its vulnerable flanks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is slower than others, meaning it can be outmanoeuvred and attacked in its vulnerable flanks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is poor when fighting hand-to-hand. Try to keep it away from enemy formations.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is poor when fighting hand-to-hand. Try to keep it away from enemy formations.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit will consistently cause low damage; it will therefore take time for them to deal with enemy units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit will consistently cause low damage; it will therefore take time for them to deal with enemy units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Raiders feel most at home in towns and villages, where they can use their torches for their favourite activity - burning things down!

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Raiders feel most at home in towns and villages, where they can use their torches for their favourite activity - burning things down!

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit consists of few men, making them easily overwhelmed.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit consists of few men, making them easily overwhelmed.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
